T02TD2734E:112b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2734E:112b-5: padmas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba //
T02TD2734E:112b-6: padma dri med phyag gi dbus na bsnams //
T02TD2734E:112b-7: thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs //
T02TD2734E:112b-8: spyi bo 'od dpag med brgyan phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2734E:112b-9: thugs rje byams pas gzigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2734E:112b-10: phongs gyur 'gro ba la ni khyod lta bu //
T02TD2734E:112b-11: gzigs pa tsam gyis zhi bar mdzad pa po //
T02TD2734E:112b-12: spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la gzigs su gsol //
T02TD2734E:112b-13: mchog sbyin bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal te //
T02TD2734E:112b-14: mun nag gtibs pa snang ba med pa bzhin //
T02TD2734E:112b-15: ri bo g-yang sa'i khan gnas 'dra yi //
T02TD2734E:112b-16: dus 'dir thugs rje ldan pas gzigs su gsol //
T02TD2734E:112b-17: phongs pa gang gis da ni dran byas na //
T02TD2734E:112b-18: de yi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes //
T02TD2734E:112b-19: dang po'i smon lam mi 'gyur de lags na //
T02TD2734E:112b-20: bdag la de 'dra'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2734E:112b-21: nga ni mthong thos reg pa'am dran yang rung //
T02TD2734E:112b-22: nad rnams kun gyi gsos su gyur cig ces //
T02TD2734E:112b-23: bdag ni mi bzad nad kyis the bas lags kyis//
T02TD2734E:112b-24: mchog sbyin dam bcas de dag dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2734E:112b-25: gang zhig sdug bsngal gang gis nyam thag pa //
T02TD2734E:112b-26: de dang de yi sdug bsngal bsal lo zhes //
T02TD2734E:112b-27: 'gro la dgongs pa khyod kyis rgyun 'byung na //
T02TD2734E:112b-28: mgon po ci slad sdug bsngal bdag ma gzigs //
T02TD2734E:112b-29: gang gis khyod ni rjes dran tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2734E:113a-0: @113a * // de yi mod la mgon pos gnod bsal na //
T02TD2734E:113a-1: bdag ni rtag tu 'di na bro 'tshal kyang //
T02TD2734E:113a-2: thugs dpag ma mdzad pa ni bdag byur ngan //
T02TD2734E:113a-3: mthu ldan sgyu med phan mdzad blo gros can //
T02TD2734E:113a-4: thugs rje ldan pa khyod la bsten kyang ni //
T02TD2734E:113a-5: ci ste 'di dag zhi bar ma gyur na //
T02TD2734E:113a-6: bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te kyi hud kyis //
T02TD2734E:113a-7: gang dang gang dag sdug bsngal nyam thag cing //
T02TD2734E:113a-8: gang dang gang dag mgon med gyur rnams la //
T02TD2734E:113a-9: de dang der ni khyod kyi thugs rje ste //
T02TD2734E:113a-10: mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhes de skad gda' //
T02TD2734E:113a-11: de ni las ngan nyon mongs bdag lags shing //
T02TD2734E:113a-12: sdug bsngal bzod dkas lus gzir skyabs ma mchis //
T02TD2734E:113a-13: skyabs med bdag la ci slad thugs mi rje //
T02TD2734E:113a-14: nyi tsher gyur na thugs rje ma lags mod //
T02TD2734E:113a-15: gang tshe sngon chad rmongs pa 'jig rten na //
T02TD2734E:113a-16: khyod nyid rjes su dran par ma bgyis pa //
T02TD2734E:113a-17: bdag ni nyon mongs stobs kyis shin tu gzir //
T02TD2734E:113a-18: mgon po 'gum du nye na thugs rjes gzigs /
T02TD2734E:113a-19: thugs rje'i 'byung gnas thugs rje che rgyas pa //
T02TD2734E:113a-20: sdug bsngal ma lus zad par mdzad khyod kyis //
T02TD2734E:113a-21: ci ste bdag ni spangs par gyur na yang //
T02TD2734E:113a-22: bdag gi mgon bgyid gzhan ni su lags gsungs //
T02TD2734E:113a-23: khyod la skyabs su mchis ba tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2734E:113a-24: de yi mod la sdug bsngal sel mdzad pas /
T02TD2734E:113a-25: mgon po khyod ni bdag gi skyabs lags kyis //
T02TD2734E:113a-26: thugs rjes mi bzad 'di las bskyab tu gsol //
T02TD2734E:113a-27: mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis nyam thag pa //
T02TD2734E:113a-28: zhi bar mdzad pa khyod dang mjal gyur la //
T02TD2734E:113a-29: bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na //
T02TD2734E:113a-30: khyod ni thugs rje can du rung lags sam //
T02TD2734E:113a-31: khyod kyis sems can bskyab phyir smon lam gang //
T02TD2734E:113a-32: btab par gyur de'ang 'grub par 'gyur lags na //
T02TD2734E:113a-33: bdag kyang sems can grangs su gtogs pas na //
T02TD2734E:113a-34: mchog sbyin bdag gi du:kha bsal du gsol //
T02TD2734E:113a-35: khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchis kyang ni //
T02TD2734E:113a-36: ci ste de ni nyam thag gyur na ko //
T02TD2734E:113a-37: nyi ma mun pa'i tshegs su gyur pa bzhin //
T02TD2734E:113a-38: zla ba'i 'od zer sreg par byed 'dra gang //
T02TD2734E:113a-39: khyod ni 'jig rten dag la gsol 'debs na //
T02TD2734E:113a-40: bdag ni khyod la gsol ba bgyid gyur pa //
T02TD2734E:113a-41: bdag ni skye bo ngan pa skal pa chung //
T02TD2734E:113a-42: bsod nams min pa'i dri ma ngan pa can //
T02TD2734E:113b-0: mgon po thugs rje che dang ma bral @113b bas //
T02TD2734E:113b-1: sems can don la bskul lta mi 'tshal kyang //
T02TD2734E:113b-2: sdug bsngal rang bzhin du ni bdag gyur pas //
T02TD2734E:113b-3: skyob pa'i spyan sngar yang ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02TD2734E:113b-4: pha dang ma la gang zhig slong na yang //
T02TD2734E:113b-5: shin tu skyo ba med pa ji bzhin du //
T02TD2734E:113b-6: sems can don brtson de ni khyod lags pas //
T02TD2734E:113b-7: tshe rabs kun du bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig / sdug bsngal mi bzad pas ni bdag gdungs pas //
T02TD2734E:113b-8: bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'bod sgrogs kyis //
T02TD2734E:113b-9: nyin gcig bzhin du sdig pa'i las kyis ni //
T02TD2734E:113b-10: zil non 'di las bdag la srung du gsol //
T02TD2734E:113b-11: de ltar bdag gis shin tu smres gsol bas//
T02TD2734E:113b-12: khyod kyi thugs ni thugs rjes brlan pa ltar //
T02TD2734E:113b-13: 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya yis gzir ba la //
T02TD2734E:113b-14: srid las grol bas de bzhin gzigs su gsol //
T02TD2734E:113b-15: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur cing sems brtan la //
T02TD2734E:113b-16: gzhan don brtson zhing yon tan mchog gi gnas //
T02TD2734E:113b-17: khyod bzhin bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi //
T02TD2734E:113b-18: gdud bsal ba'i mthu dang ldan par shog / de ltar srid pa mthar phyin spyan ras gzigs dbang la //
T02TD2734E:113b-19: bdag gis bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02TD2734E:113b-20: des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing bcom pa yi //
T02TD2734E:113b-21: rang bzhin bde ldan bde ba can du 'gro bar shog / snying rje la bstod pa dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
